Package com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.basic

Converters for common basic types in Java.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractSingleValueConverter
    Base abstract implementation of SingleValueConverter.
    BigDecimalConverter
    Converts a BigDecimal to a string, retaining its precision.
    BigIntegerConverter
    Converts a BigInteger to a string.
    BooleanConverter
    Converts a boolean primitive or Boolean wrapper to a string.
    ByteConverter
    Converts a byte primitive or Byte wrapper to a string.
    CharConverter
    Converts a char primitive or Character wrapper to a string.
    DateConverter
    Converts a Date to a string as a date format, retaining precision down to milliseconds.
    DoubleConverter
    Converts a double primitive or Double wrapper to a string.
    FloatConverter
    Converts a float primitive or Float wrapper to a string.
    IntConverter
    Converts an int primitive or Integer wrapper to a string.
    LongConverter
    Converts a long primitive or Long wrapper to a string.
    NullConverter
    Special converter to signify nulls at the root level or in collection types.
    ShortConverter
    Converts a short primitive or Short wrapper to a string.
    StringBufferConverter
    Converts the contents of a StringBuffer to a string.
    StringBuilderConverter
    Converts the contents of a StringBuilder to a string.

Package com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.basic Description

Converters for common basic types in Java. These include primitives (int, boolean, etc), wrapper objects (Integer, Boolean, etc), String, StringBuffer, java.util.Date, null, java.net.URL, java.math.BigInteger and java.math.BigDecimal.

These converters are enabled by default.

All of the basic converters will convert the item into a single String, with no nested elements.
